content: I'll be away from the rest of today included up to Jan 6th. Happy EOY holidays!
and it's a new year, be it happy for y'all!

All the Mozilla team will be likely away and busy all of next week, because of a company-wide seminar. In particular I expect nobody from Mozilla is going to attend next Monday's (Jan 27th) Cranelift meeting. I'll send a note to the event's attendees too.
